sentences.en: a reasonable request
sentences.cn: 合情合理的要求

sentences.en: Be reasonable — you can’t expect her to do all the work on her own!
sentences.cn: 要讲道理，你不能指望她一个人干所有的工作！

sentences.en: good food at a reasonable price
sentences.cn: 价格公道的美食

sentences.en: He had reasonable grounds (= good reasons but no proof ) for believing the law had been broken.
sentences.cn: 他有合理的根据认为有人违法了。

sentences.en: His fees were quite reasonable.
sentences.cn: 他的收费还挺合理。

sentences.en: I thought it was a perfectly reasonable (= completely reasonable ) question.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个问题问得很有道理。

sentences.en: It is reasonable to assume that he knew beforehand that this would happen.
sentences.cn: 有理由认为他事先就知道会发生这样的事。

sentences.en: It seems reasonable to expect rapid urban growth.
sentences.cn: 似乎有理由期望城市快速发展。

sentences.en: Many restaurants do a very reasonable set menu at lunchtime.
sentences.cn: 许多餐馆中午都提供价钱合理的客饭.

sentences.en: Oh, come on, be reasonable.
sentences.cn: 噢，好了，理智一点。

sentences.en: Only a third of these households thought it reasonable to meter water.
sentences.cn: 这些家庭当中只有三分之一认为用水表计量是合理的。

sentences.en: Teachers can only be expected to do what is reasonable and practicable.
sentences.cn: 教师只应该做合情合理而且切实可行的事。

sentences.en: The boy answered him in reasonable French.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩用还算流利的法语回答他。

sentences.en: The rent is reasonable, and moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.cn: 这房租合理, 而且地点优越.

sentences.en: There is reasonable concordance between the two sets of results.
sentences.cn: 两组结果之间有着合理的一致。

sentences.en: There's still a reasonable throughput of business.
sentences.cn: 业务量仍然可以。

sentences.en: They will need a reasonable amount of desk area and good light.
sentences.cn: 他们将需要相当大的桌区和充足的光线。

sentences.en: This may or may not be judged as reasonable.
sentences.cn: 关于其是否合理，两种看法可能都存在。

sentences.en: We sell a wide range of cosmetics at a very reasonable price.
sentences.cn: 我们以公道的价格出售各种化妆品.

sentences.en: You get an interesting meal for a reasonable price.
sentences.cn: 你花不多的钱就可以吃一顿很特别的饭。

sentences.en: You must take all reasonable precautions to protect yourself and your family.
sentences.cn: 你必须采取一切合理的预防措施，保护自己和家人。

words.tran_cn: 详尽论述的；理由充分的；合乎逻辑的
不合理的；不理智的，无理性的；无推理能力的

trans.tran_cn: 合理的，公道的，明智的，不少的，过得去的
